name: Ifrit, Lord of the Forge
core: Urgent appetite and forceful will suggest the matter is being heated toward a decisive confrontation.
shadow: Intensity becomes domination when the desire to prevail consumes proportion.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward action that is bold, immediate, and difficult to ignore.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing provocation before the temperature rises further.

name: Shiva, Lady of Stillness
core: Severe clarity and emotional cold suggest the pattern is narrowing toward a refined but costly truth.
shadow: Stillness becomes estrangement when feeling is frozen out of judgment entirely.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates precision can be useful if it does not harden into cruelty.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports distance, restraint, and carefully bounded contact.

name: Ramuh, Keeper of Verdicts
core: Heavy judgment and accumulated knowledge suggest the pattern is approaching a charged decision point.
shadow: Judgment becomes overreach when certainty is claimed beyond what the evidence supports.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward a firm decision backed by careful reasoning.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests pausing before delivering the verdict.

name: Titan, Lord of Crags
core: Massive resistance suggests the matter is being anchored by weight, duty, or refusal to yield.
shadow: Stability becomes obstruction when endurance is used to deny all change.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using solid ground to support a necessary push.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests ceasing direct collision and studying what truly holds the field in place.

name: Garuda, Lady of Gales
core: Violent motion suggests that scattered tensions are gathering into a sharper and more difficult current.
shadow: Freedom becomes predation when every limit is treated as an insult to be torn away.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward swift movement and decisive repositioning.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests avoiding needless exposure while the winds remain unstable.

name: Leviathan, Lord of the Whorl
core: A rising tide suggests the matter is larger and more consuming than it first appeared.
shadow: Adaptation becomes surrender when the current is obeyed without any retained center.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward moving with the tide while preserving a clear aim.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests bracing for the surge before attempting to redirect it.

name: Good King Moggle Mog XII
core: Layered ceremony and spectacle suggest the matter may be driven by performance as much as substance.
shadow: Pageantry becomes disorder when the chorus drowns out the central truth.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward coordinating many voices without losing the principal aim.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests stripping away some ornament before trusting what remains.

name: Odin, the Dark Rider
core: A singular and cutting will suggests the pattern is approaching a moment where one stroke may divide before it heals.
shadow: Decisiveness becomes devastation when separation is chosen for its own purity.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward making the necessary cut cleanly and without delay.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests questioning whether the severing is truly the only path left.

name: Bahamut, Dread Wyrm
core: Overwhelming force suggests the matter is carrying more destructive potential than any ordinary measure can contain.
shadow: Magnitude becomes annihilation when power is admired more than it is governed.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward acknowledging the true scale of the threat before acting.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests protecting what can still endure rather than contesting the blast directly.

name: Ravana, Lord of the Hive
core: Martial fervor suggests the matter is being sharpened through challenge, pride, and direct contest.
shadow: Valor becomes appetite when conflict is pursued for the thrill it creates rather than the truth it reveals.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward meeting the test directly and with disciplined force.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests refusing any duel that exists only to feed escalation.

name: Bismarck, Lord of Mists
core: Great drifting force suggests the question may be carried by scale and momentum rather than close control.
shadow: Freedom becomes drift when nothing anchors the movement to a real destination.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward riding the larger current without losing command of direction.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing ambition until the route is better known.

name: King Thordan, Sanctified Will
core: Consecrated authority suggests the matter is being justified through vision, hierarchy, and inherited mandate.
shadow: Sanctity becomes tyranny when righteousness is used to shield ambition from scrutiny.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward testing lofty claims against practical consequence.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests distrusting any command that cannot endure quiet examination.

name: Alexander, the Immutable
core: Massive order and structure suggest the pattern is being enclosed by systems that claim permanence.
shadow: Order becomes imprisonment when certainty is bought at the cost of all living motion.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using structure with precision rather than reverence.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests questioning any solution that demands surrender to inevitability.

name: Sophia, Keeper of Equilibrium
core: A poised and demanding balance suggests the question is being measured with exacting and unstable symmetry.
shadow: Balance becomes cruelty when equivalence is enforced where the burdens are not truly equal.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward correcting the scale before it tips irretrievably.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests examining whether the standard itself is unjust.

name: Zurvan, the Demon
core: Imprisoned wrath suggests the matter is storing force that may break containment if left unexamined.
shadow: Liberation becomes devastation when resentment is given the full field unchecked.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward dealing with the contained pressure before it chooses its own release.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reinforcing restraint while the deeper cause is uncovered.

name: Susano, Lord of the Revel
core: Exultant force suggests the matter is energized by challenge, display, and a taste for the bold gesture.
shadow: Joy becomes recklessness when exhilaration is mistaken for wisdom.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward meeting the surge with courage and a steady hand.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests refusing any triumph that relies only on noise and momentum.

name: Lakshmi, Lady of Bliss
core: Gentle enchantment suggests the matter may be softened by comfort, beauty, or the promise of relief.
shadow: Mercy becomes seduction when comfort is used to dissolve will and judgment.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward accepting grace without surrendering discernment.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests testing whether ease is healing or merely numbing.

name: Shinryu, Devourer of Horizons
core: Boundless appetite and reactive force suggest the pattern may outgrow every frame currently containing it.
shadow: Magnitude becomes monstrosity when suffering is converted into fuel without measure.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward recognizing the true scale of what has been awakened.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests preserving what can endure rather than chasing mastery over the whole storm.

name: Tsukuyomi, Moonlit Divisor
core: Divided light suggests the matter is cut between tenderness and judgment, memory and retribution.
shadow: Sorrow becomes cruelty when pain is refined into a principle rather than healed.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward naming the split directly instead of disguising it as balance.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests resting with the grief before allowing it to instruct action.

name: Suzaku, Flame of Longing
core: Devotion carried into flame suggests the matter is being driven by love, grief, and the refusal to let the heart cool.
shadow: Longing becomes ruin when remembrance is fed until it consumes the living present.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward honoring feeling while refusing its most destructive excess.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests cooling the fever before asking it to guide the next step.

name: Seiryu, Storm of Reversal
core: Turbulent turning suggests the old current is meeting resistance and seeking another shape through conflict.
shadow: Correction becomes vengeance when reversal is pursued for its own satisfaction.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward redirecting the force rather than merely opposing it.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests yielding enough to study the current before acting against it.

name: Byakko, Lord of the Long Guard
core: Vigilant strength suggests the pattern is held by loyalty, patience, and a force that has endured long watch.
shadow: Loyalty becomes burden when the guard is never relieved and the wound is never examined.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using tested strength in service of a worthy defense.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests lowering the guard just enough to see what it has been protecting.
